meta.job_title: Ecommerce Merchandising and Web Content Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively manage the aesthetic presentation of the online assortment, including product information, category information, and website merchandising to influence sales and conversion.
Monitor website content and product assortments, ensuring that product information is accurate and up to date.
Conduct thorough checks for online product quality, including images, categorization, pricing, and availability.
Create an elevated website experience by using data-driven insights and digital best practices to activate a seamless customer experience.
Collaborate with the Digital Marketing, Consumer Service, Supply Chain, and Merchandise teams to identify compelling product narratives and ideas for the season.
Research industry best practices to identify, evaluate, and maintain holiday calendars to ensure builds, testing, and launch dates are met.
Collaborate with media planners and the HQ Digital Content team to evaluate commercial messages.
Partner with internal and external IT resources to troubleshoot customer order issues.
Work cross-functionally with the Supply Chain department to drive improvements in their processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Merchandising, User Experience, or Statistics
